selections.description: Improved hierarchy with larger title and reduced particle density
selections.note: love the slow option and button animation, but miss the brand logo and fonts from the original. something thatss missing from the original as well is this feeling that the particles are stars. it connects with the language on the page. the dynamics though are cool i don't know how you would reconcile those

selections.description: Sparse, intentional design with connected particle patterns
selections.note: bring back the brand title as is. it was perfect as is. the animation and enter button are cool i like them - i do like the little day icon

selections.description: Warmer palette with purposeful star connections
selections.note:
bring the original brand title and fonts incuding sizes from particles. that will be our go to, bring it as is. i'm open to colour if it makes sense

also, we are kind of missing the constellation part! make constellations that are twinkling slowly - themese of this page are fine. the fonts though are not ideal.

take the button from option 2.

selections.description: Dynamic star movement with flowing connections
selections.note:
remove this quote. 
Constellations are drawing themselves • Wait for the magic

leverag similar feedback as option 2.

selections.description: Sparse star field with elegant restraint
selections.note: i like this but bring the brand ttile of the original particles to here as is. the fonts on the page content could use some work.

selections.description: Rich gold palette with Arabic poetry heritage aesthetic
selections.note: love the light dark icon animation, colour,  and particles and glow button - still mssing the fonts, and brand (the original title and fonts are what i want to keep)

selections.description: Islamic geometric patterns with natural breathing rhythm
selections.note:
replace mandala completely. you are an andalusian architect, you use mathematical cacluations to create the islamic geometric patterns of the era. use these with particles or brush stroke lines to draw on the whole page. get creative with the layering

bring the brand title from the partiicles original as is. 

Revisit page font selections, and copy - write it well and be tuned to the theme.

use the button from option 2

selections.description: Mathematical precision with sacred geometry principles
selections.note:
let's get grounded in the actual mathematical design of the andalusian geomtric patterns, define them and implement them. they are not stars. consult the mathematical literature of how these shapes  were created

bring the title as is from particles, but feel free to explore the colours.

add some zen effect, obvs it should be minimal. 
Bring the brand title exactly as it is from the particles original
maybe create a smoke animation using similar approaches/frameworks as your lights and dark theme option.
i do like this one. but bring bakc the brand title and styling eactly as it is in the original particles

selections.description: Warmer palette with enhanced aurora drama
selections.note: the original is leagues better. just keep the original

selections.description: Animated brush stroke revealing calligraphy in real-time
selections.note: i like this one but the arabic is not rendered propelry. i do like how you highlihgted the arabic word one letter at a time. make sure this happens right to left and feels continous not chopped.

selections.description: Rich Islamic illumination with gold leaf details
selections.note: the original was way better at looking like it was unrolling like a book. you should stick to the original concept and polish.

selections.description: Book spine perspective with leather-bound aesthetics
selections.note: i like this concept, but you need to actually fix the copy, word choice, and spacing to make it look lke a book not a eye doctors office.

selections.description: Unfurling scroll with wax seal authenticity
selections.note:
i like this idea, but it all looks too digital. this scroll needs to look like paper. 

also refine the font choices for the english and arabic and make sure they complement each other and theme.

selections.description: Dramatic light-dark contrast with Renaissance influence
selections.note: the fonts were better on the original. the light in the back is nice. bring some of the light particles from option 3 in and make sure the animation is a bit slower and doesnt' seem like a loop rather a continous movement of light.

selections.description: Clean light rays with minimalist approach
selections.note: these ethereal particles are great, make them appear in the dark area really lightly as if dust and then keep the white level that crosses through the light. make the light move ever so slightly and increse the number of particles every so slightly.
